summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the purchase of easements across Block 490, certain harbor area adjoining, and a portion of the waterway abutting Block 489, Seattle Tide Lands Extension No. 1, necessary for the West Seattle-Alki Sewer Separation Project Contract No. 6, and for the expenses of the Engineering Department in connection with such purchase, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
